overview: Be ready for the last DVD in the Friendly Fire triology. Visited cities include Stockholm, Olso, Malm√∂ and Copenhagen. Fast cuts and hard music presents live action from crews as AOD, NER, BST, VIM, ALL, WUFC, HLC, AE, Y2K and more.
